title: Process to evaluate cause of other people behavior

content.question: Darla sees Roger at the local shopping center one afternoon. She says his name and says hello, but he does not acknowledge her or speak back to her. After she gets home, she tells her mother that Roger is a snob who isn't friendly. Darla's process by which she evaluated the causes of Roger's behavior is called which of the following?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
